SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE PLACE_TITLE PLACE_ADDRESS
WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PLACE_NO , PLACE_TITLE , PLACE_ADDRESS , PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE P JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE P.PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE_LIKE JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE_LIKE JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY LIKE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
DELETE FROM PLACE_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT PLACE_IMAGE_NO , PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE , PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE_IMAGE WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_COUNT = PLACE_COUNT + 1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,PLACE_CONTENT_POINT ,PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL ,PLACE_THEMA ,PLACE_ADDRESS ,PLACE_HOMEPAGE ,PLACE_CONTACT ,PLACE_TIME ,PLACE_START ,PLACE_END FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,PLACE_CONTENT_POINT ,PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL ,PLACE_THEMA ,PLACE_ADDRESS ,PLACE_HOMEPAGE ,PLACE_CONTACT ,PLACE_TIME ,PLACE_START ,PLACE_END FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PLACE_IMAGE_NO ,PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE ,PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE_IMAGE WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_NAME ,REVIEW_STAR ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,REVIEW_CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT LIKE_NO FROM PLACE_LIKE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND USER_NO =?
